verses.verse: Now on the twenty-fourth day<WH3117> of this<WH2088> month<WH2320> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> assembled<WH622> with fasting,<WH6685> in sackcloth,<WH8242> and with dirt<WH127> upon them.

And the descendants<WH2233> of Israel<WH3478> separated<WH914> themselves from all<WH3605> foreigners,<WH1121> <WH5236> and stood<WH5975> and confessed<WH3034> their sins<WH9128> and the iniquities<WH5771> of their fathers.

While they stood<WH6965> in their place,<WH5977> they read<WH7121> from the book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> of the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430> for a fourth<WH7243> of the day;<WH3117> and for [another] fourth<WH7243> they confessed<WH3034> and worshiped<WH7812> the Lord<WH3068> their God.<WH430>

Now on the Levites' platform<WH4608> stood<WH6965> Jeshua,<WH3091> Bani,<WH1137> Kadmiel,<WH6934> Shebaniah,<WH7645> Bunni,<WH1138> Sherebiah,<WH8274> Bani,<WH1137> [and] Chenani,<WH3662> and they cried<WH2199> with a loud<WH1419> voice<WH6963> to the Lord<WH3068> their God.<WH430>

Then the Levites,<WH3881> Jeshua,<WH3091> Kadmiel,<WH6934> Bani,<WH1137> Hashabneiah,<WH2813> Sherebiah,<WH8274> Hodiah,<WH1941> Shebaniah,<WH7645> [and] Pethahiah,<WH6611> said,<WH559> "Arise,<WH6965> bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> forever<WH4480> <WH5769> and ever!<WH5769> O may Thy glorious<WH9202> name<WH8034> be blessed<WH1288> And exalted<WH7311> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> blessing<WH1293> and praise!<WH8416>

"Thou alone<WH905> art the Lord.<WH3068> Thou hast made<WH6213> the heavens,<WH8064> The heaven<WH8064> of heavens<WH8084> with all<WH3605> their host,<WH6635> The earth<WH776> and all<WH3605> that is on it, The seas<WH3220> and all<WH3605> that is in them. Thou dost give<WH2421> life<WH2421> to all<WH3605> of them And the heavenly<WH8064> host<WH6635> bows<WH7812> down<WH7812> before Thee.
"Thou art the Lord<WH3068> God,<WH430> Who<WH834> chose<WH977> Abram<WH87> And brought<WH3318> him out from Ur<WH218> of the Chaldees,<WH3778> And gave<WH7760> him the name<WH8034> Abraham.<WH85>

"And Thou didst find<WH4672> his heart<WH3824> faithful<WH539> before<WH6440> Thee, And didst make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with him To give<WH5414> [him] the land<WH776> of the Canaanite,<WH3669> Of the Hittite<WH2850> and the Amorite,<WH567> Of the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Jebusite,<WH2983> and the Girgashite<WH1622> â€“ To give<WH5414> [it] to his descendants.<WH2233> And Thou hast fulfilled<WH6965> Thy promise,<WH1697> For Thou art righteous.<WH6662>
"Thou didst see<WH7200> the affliction<WH6040> of our fathers in Egypt,<WH1> And didst hear<WH4714> their cry<WH8085> by the Red<WH2201> <WH5488> Sea.<WH3220>

"Then Thou didst perform<WH5414> signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> against Pharaoh,<WH6547> Against all<WH3605> his servants<WH5650> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of his land;<WH776> For Thou didst know<WH3045> that they acted<WH2102> arrogantly<WH2102> toward<WH5921> them, And didst make<WH6213> a name<WH8034> for Thyself as [it is] this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

"And Thou didst divide<WH1234> the sea<WH3220> before<WH6440> them, So they passed<WH5674> through the midst<WH8432> of the sea<WH3220> on dry<WH3004> ground;<WH3004> And their pursuers<WH7291> Thou didst hurl<WH7993> into the depths,<WH4688> Like<WH3644> a stone<WH68> into raging<WH5794> waters.<WH4325>

"And with a pillar<WH5982> of cloud<WH6051> Thou didst lead<WH5148> them by day,<WH3119> And with a pillar<WH5982> of fire<WH784> by night<WH3915> To light<WH215> for them the way<WH1870> In which<WH834> they were to go.<WH1980>

"Then Thou didst come<WH3381> down<WH3381> on Mount<WH2022> Sinai,<WH5514> And didst speak<WH1696> with them from heaven;<WH8064> Thou didst give<WH5414> to them just<WH3477> ordinances<WH4941> and true<WH571> laws,<WH8451> Good<WH2896> statutes<WH2706> and commandments.<WH4687>

"So Thou didst make<WH3045> known<WH3045> to them Thy holy<WH6944> sabbath,<WH7676> And didst lay<WH6680> down<WH6680> for them commandments,<WH4687> statutes,<WH2706> and law,<WH8451> Through<WH3027> Thy servant<WH5650> Moses.<WH4872>

"Thou didst provide<WH5414> bread<WH3899> from heaven<WH8064> for them for their hunger,<WH7458> Thou didst bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> water<WH4325> from a rock<WH5553> for them for their thirst,<WH6772> And Thou didst tell<WH559> them to enter<WH935> in order to possess<WH3423> The land<WH776> which<WH834> Thou didst swear<WH5375> <WH3027> to give<WH5414> them.
"But they, our fathers, acted<WH1> arrogantly;<WH2102> They became<WH2102> <WH7185> stubborn<WH6203> <WH7185> and would not listen<WH6203> to Thy commandments.<WH8085>

"And they refused<WH3985> to listen,<WH8085> And did not remember<WH2142> Thy wondrous<WH6381> deeds<WH6381> which<WH834> Thou hadst performed<WH6213> among<WH5973> them; So they became<WH7185> <WH6203> stubborn<WH7185> <WH6203> and appointed<WH5414> a leader<WH7218> to return<WH7725> to their slavery<WH5659> in Egypt.<WH4714> But Thou art a God<WH433> of forgiveness,<WH5547> Gracious<WH2587> and compassionate,<WH7349> Slow<WH750> to anger,<WH639> and abounding<WH7227> in lovingkindness;<WH2617> And Thou didst not forsake<WH5800> them.

"Even<WH637> when<WH3588> they made<WH6213> for themselves A calf<WH5695> of molten<WH4541> metal<WH4541> And said,<WH559> 'This<WH2088> is your God<WH430> Who<WH834> brought<WH5927> you up from Egypt,<WH4714>' And committed<WH6213> great<WH1419> blasphemies,<WH9308>

Thou, in Thy great<WH7227> compassion,<WH7356> Didst not forsake<WH5800> them in the wilderness;<WH4057> The pillar<WH5982> of cloud<WH6051> did not leave<WH5493> <WH4480> <WH5921> them by day,<WH3119> To guide<WH5148> them on their way,<WH1870> Nor<WH3808> the pillar<WH5982> of fire<WH784> by night,<WH3915> to light<WH215> for them the way<WH1870> in which<WH834> they were to go.<WH1980>

"And Thou didst give<WH5414> Thy good<WH2896> Spirit<WH7307> to instruct<WH7919> them, Thy manna<WH4478> Thou didst not withhold<WH4513> from their mouth,<WH6310> And Thou didst give<WH5414> them water<WH4325> for their thirst.<WH6772>

"Indeed, forty<WH705> years<WH8141> Thou didst provide<WH3557> for them in the wilderness<WH4057> [and] they were not in want;<WH2637> Their clothes<WH8008> did not wear<WH1086> out, nor<WH3808> did their feet<WH7272> swell.<WH1216>

"Thou didst also give<WH5414> them kingdoms<WH4467> and peoples,<WH5971> And Thou didst allot<WH2505> [them] to them as a boundary.<WH6285> And they took<WH3423> possession<WH3423> of the land<WH776> of Sihon<WH5511> the king<WH4428> of Heshbon,<WH2809> And the land<WH776> of Og<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan.<WH1316>

"And Thou didst make<WH7235> their sons<WH1121> numerous<WH7235> as the stars<WH3556> of heaven,<WH8064> And Thou didst bring<WH935> them into the land<WH776> Which<WH834> Thou hadst told<WH559> their fathers to enter<WH1> and possess.<WH935>

"So their sons<WH1121> entered<WH935> and possessed<WH3423> the land.<WH776> And Thou didst subdue<WH3665> before<WH6440> them the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> the Canaanites,<WH3669> And Thou didst give<WH5414> them into their hand,<WH3027> with their kings,<WH4428> and the peoples<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> To do<WH6213> with them as they desired.<WH7522>

"And they captured<WH3920> fortified<WH1219> cities<WH5892> and a fertile<WH8082> land.<WH127> They took<WH3423> possession<WH3423> of houses<WH1004> full<WH4392> of every<WH3605> good<WH2898> thing,<WH2898> Hewn<WH2672> cisterns,<WH953> vineyards,<WH3754> olive<WH2132> groves,<WH2132> Fruit<WH3978> trees<WH6086> in abundance.<WH7230> So they ate,<WH398> were filled,<WH7646> and grew<WH8080> fat,<WH8080> And reveled<WH5727> in Thy great<WH1419> goodness.<WH2898>

"But they became<WH4784> disobedient<WH4784> and rebelled<WH4775> against Thee, And cast<WH7993> Thy law<WH8451> behind<WH310> their backs<WH1458> And killed<WH2026> Thy prophets<WH5030> who<WH834> had admonished<WH5749> them So that they might return<WH7725> to Thee, And they committed<WH6213> great<WH1419> blasphemies.<WH9308>

"Therefore Thou didst deliver<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of their oppressors<WH6862> who oppressed<WH9503> them, But when they cried<WH6817> to Thee in the time<WH6256> of their distress,<WH6869> Thou didst hear<WH8085> from heaven,<WH8064> and according to Thy great<WH7227> compassion<WH7356> Thou didst give<WH5414> them deliverers<WH3467> who delivered<WH3467> them from the hand<WH3027> of their oppressors.<WH6862>

"But as soon as they had<WH5117> rest,<WH5117> they did<WH6213> evil<WH9563> again<WH7725> before<WH6440> Thee; Therefore Thou didst abandon<WH5800> them to the hand<WH3027> of their enemies,<WH340> so that they ruled<WH7287> over them. When they cried<WH2199> again<WH7725> to Thee, Thou didst hear<WH8085> from heaven,<WH8064> And many<WH7227> times<WH6256> Thou didst rescue<WH5337> them according to Thy compassion,<WH7356>

And admonished<WH5749> them in order to turn<WH7725> them back<WH7725> to Thy law.<WH8451> Yet they acted<WH2102> arrogantly<WH2102> and did not listen<WH8085> to Thy commandments<WH4687> but sinned<WH2398> against Thine ordinances,<WH4941> By which<WH834> if a man<WH120> observes<WH6213> them he shall live.<WH2421> And they turned<WH5414> a stubborn<WH5637> shoulder<WH3802> and stiffened<WH7185> their neck,<WH6203> and would not listen.<WH8085>

"However, Thou didst bear<WH4900> with them for many<WH7227> years,<WH8141> And admonished<WH5749> them by Thy Spirit<WH7307> through<WH3027> Thy prophets,<WH5030> Yet they would not give<WH238> ear.<WH238> Therefore Thou didst give<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of the peoples<WH5971> of the lands.<WH776>

"Nevertheless, in Thy great<WH7227> compassion<WH7356> Thou didst not make<WH6213> an end<WH3617> of them or forsake<WH5800> them, For Thou art a gracious<WH2587> and compassionate<WH7349> God.<WH410>

"Now<WH6258> therefore, our God,<WH430> the great,<WH1419> the mighty,<WH1368> and the awesome<WH3372> God,<WH410> who dost keep<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and lovingkindness,<WH2617> Do not let all<WH3605> the hardship<WH8513> seem<WH4591> insignificant<WH4591> before<WH6440> Thee, Which<WH834> has come<WH4672> upon us, our kings,<WH4428> our princes,<WH8269> our priests,<WH3548> our prophets,<WH5030> our fathers, and on all<WH1> Thy people,<WH3605> From the days<WH5971> of the kings<WH3117> of Assyria<WH4428> to this<WH804> day.<WH2088>
"However, Thou art just<WH6662> in all<WH3605> that has come<WH935> upon us; For Thou hast dealt<WH6213> faithfully,<WH571> but we have acted<WH7561> wickedly.<WH7561>

"For our kings,<WH4428> our leaders,<WH8269> our priests,<WH3548> and our fathers have not kept<WH1> Thy law<WH6213> Or paid<WH8451> attention<WH7181> to Thy commandments<WH7181> and Thine admonitions<WH4687> with which<WH5715> Thou hast admonished<WH834> them.

"But they, in their own kingdom,<WH4438> With Thy great<WH7227> goodness<WH2898> which<WH834> Thou didst give<WH5414> them, With the broad<WH7342> and rich<WH8082> land<WH776> which<WH834> Thou didst set<WH5414> before<WH6440> them, Did not serve<WH5647> Thee or turn<WH7725> from their evil<WH7451> deeds.<WH4611>

"Behold,<WH2009> we are slaves<WH5650> today,<WH3117> And as to the land<WH776> which<WH834> Thou didst give<WH5414> to our fathers to eat<WH1> of its fruit<WH398> and its bounty,<WH6529> Behold,<WH2898> we are slaves<WH2009> on it.

"And its abundant<WH7235> produce<WH8393> is for the kings<WH4428> Whom<WH834> Thou hast set<WH5414> over<WH5921> us because of our sins;<WH9128> They also rule<WH4910> over<WH5921> our bodies<WH1472> And over our cattle<WH929> as they please,<WH7522> So we are in great<WH1419> distress.<WH6869>

"Now because of all<WH3605> this<WH384> We are making<WH3772> an agreement<WH548> in writing;<WH3772> And on the sealed<WH2856> document [are the names of] our leaders,<WH8269> our Levites<WH3881> [and] our priests.<WH3548>"
